known_recommendations.intervention: **Nephrogenic Systemic Fibrosis (NSF)**: The primary historical concern with GBCAs in kidney disease patients, particularly those with eGFR <30 mL/min/1.73m². Risk is nearly eliminated with modern group II macrocyclic agents (gadobutrol, gadoteridol, gadoterate meglumine)
